short_summary: Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS), Data Management and Analytics
description: Shared Services Canada intends to award two contracts for Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) in the National Capital Region. The two contracts will be awarded for a period of two years, plus three option periods of one year each. Services will be provided in the following categories: A.1 Application/ Software Architect - Senior, A.1 Application/ Software Architect - Intermediate, A.6 Programmer/ Software Developer - Senior, A.6 Programmer/ Software Developer - Intermediate, A.7 Programmer/Analyst - Senior, A.7 Programmer/Analyst - Intermediate, I.3 Database Analyst - Senior, I.3 Database Analyst - Intermediate, I.2 Database Administrator - Senior, I.2 Database Administrator - Intermediate, I.4 Database Modeller/IM Modeller - Senior, I.4 Database Modeller/IM Modeller - Intermediate, I.5 IM Architect - Senior, I.5 IM Architect - Intermediate, I.11 Technology Architect - Senior, I.11 Technology Architect - Intermediate
full_summary:
Shared Services Canada - Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)  – Tier 2 – Data Management and Analytics
Reference No: cb-243-58502798
Revision Date: 2024-01-19
Publication Date: 2023-11-17
Closes: 2024-01-19T14:00:00
Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-03-01
Expected Contract End Date: 2026-03-31

Contract Description
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals from qualified Service Providers for Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) - Tier 2 - Data Management and Analytics.

Scope
The requirement is open to Service Providers who have qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region for the specified categories:
- A.1 Application/Software Architect - Senior
- A.1 Application/Software Architect - Intermediate
- A.6 Programmer/Software Developer - Senior
- A.6 Programmer/Software Developer - Intermediate
- I.3 Database Analyst - Senior
- I.3 Database Analyst - Intermediate
- I.2 Database Administrator - Senior
- I.2 Database Administrator - Intermediate
- I.4 Database Modeller/IM Modeller - Senior
- I.4 Database Modeller/IM Modeller - Intermediate
- I.5 IM Architect - Senior
- I.5 IM Architect - Intermediate
- I.11 Technology Architect - Senior
- I.11 Technology Architect - Intermediate

Contract Award
SSC intends to award two contracts.

Selection Criteria
The Selection Board will evaluate submissions based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

Security Level
The awarded contract will have a Security Level of Secret.

Eligible Service Providers:
A list of invited Service Providers has been attached as an annex to this document. 

Contracting Entity
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street
Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8

Point of Contact
Julie Bampton
Email: [julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-790-5915
